name: The Santa Games
description:
Welcome to the annual Santa Games!

Santa gets in shape by competing in 6 fun one-touch mini-games that will require precision and quick reflexes:

* Santa Slalom: avoid obstacles by moving side to side and help Santa drive his sleigh

* Present Throw: find the right angle, at the right time, to throw presents into chimneys

* Cookie Catch: tilt a platform to have Santa roll and catch delicious cookies

* Chimney Dive: help Santa down a chimney by placing pegs along the way so that he avoids dangers and gets the cookies

* Downhill Santa: help Santa go lightning fast down a hill

* Present Drop: fin the right timing to drop presents into chimneys
